title: Addrisi Brothers ~ Never My Love ~ Lost Album Sessions (FLAC)
description:
The Addrisi Brothers ~ Never My Love ~ The Lost Album Sessions

It's rare to discover a fully realized album that's never been released. Rarer still to find one that's worth listening to; one that is so wonderfully musical and evocative of its era. In many ways this previously unreleased album is like the "new old stock" so treasured by car nuts and collectors of many types. Such items are vintage in origin, but mint in condition. 

The Addrisi Brothers, Don and Richard, recorded this album hot on the heels of their songwriting breakthrough (made famous by the Association), "Never My Love." With their tune topping the charts they were able to land a recording deal and waxed (well, taped, actually) a full album of original songs.

1. Together
2. The Pleasure Of Her Company
3. You, Me And the Rain
4. She's Just Laughing At Me
5. Happiness
6. Windy Wakefield
7. Never My Love
8. I Believe in Love
9. Gypsy Summer
10. Doesn't Our Love Look Nice Today
11. Married Man
